short_summary: One (1) senior level Engineering Graduate to support C4ISR related projects of the Radar and Communications Systems (R&C) group within the Directorate of Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the provision of one (1) senior level Engineering Graduate to support all Command, Control, Communications, Computers, Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance (C4ISR) related projects for the Radar and Communications Systems (R&C)   group within the Directorate of Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM).
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS)

## Table of Contents
1. Tender Details
2. Tender Description
3. Pre-qualified Suppliers
4. Key Dates and Times
5. Security Requirements
6. Contact Information

## Tender Details
- **Reference Number:** PW-22-01013714
- **Solicitation Number:** W8485-TSPS2022-11
- **Publication Date:** November 16, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date:** December 5, 2022, at 2:00 PM (EST)
- **Region(s) of Opportunity:** World
- **Region(s) of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and others.

## Tender Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking the services of an Engineering Graduate (Senior) to support Command, Control, Communications, Computers, Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance (C4ISR) related projects for the Radar and Communications Systems (R&CS) 4-5 group within the Directorate of Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM).

## Pre-qualified Suppliers
The tender is open to the following pre-qualified suppliers:

* Access Corporate Technologies Inc.
* ACF Associates Inc.
* ADGA Group Consultants Inc., and many more.

## Key Dates and Times
- **Notice of Intention to Award:** None
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
- **Expected Contract End Date:** None

## Security Requirements
- Security Requirements Checklist: Common #20
- Supplier Security Clearance: Secret

## Contact Information
- **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of National Defence
- **Contact Name:** Knight, Bronwyn
- **Contact Email:** <bronwyn.knight@forces.gc.ca>
- **Contact Phone:** 819-939-5103

This tender announcement has been published by the Department of National Defence to solicit proposals for Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS) from pre-qualified suppliers. The term of the contract will be one (1) year, with three (3) one-year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term. 

Only suppliers on the list of pre-qualified suppliers (SPICT) for the services of an Engineering Graduate (Senior) are eligible to bid on this project.
